name: time wasting machine
description:
Do you want to waste some time?

If so, this app may be exactly what you are looking for!
You can waste your time at home, or while you're on the way.
It's best to get it right now, if you don't want to not waste time much longer.

Besides, the App includes a counter that shows you how much time you have already wasted and you will be rewarded with great unlockables along the way.
